alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caddo, south central Blaine and west central Canadian Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hinton, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hinton, Geary, and Bridgeport. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 92 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
